author: COMSOL
description: This example illustrates the modeling of a straight conical bevel gear pair. The gears are modeled as rigid and connected through a gear pair. A transient study is performed to compute the forces and moments experienced by the fixed gear. The results obtained are compared with the results from the reference.
label: bevel_gear_pair.mph
name: root

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Bevel Gear

Bevel gear geometry. Tooth fillet, center hole, material removal from gear blank, and shaft are optional.
